    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DoubleBox, Input, IntegerBox, LongBox, TextBoxBase

    public class ValueBoxBase<T>
extends ValueBoxBase<T>
implements HasId, HasReadOnly, HasResponsiveness, HasPlaceholder, HasAutoComplete, HasSize<InputSize>, HasEditorErrors<T>, HasErrorHandler, HasValidators<T>, HasBlankValidator<T>
